title: If there are no ghosts or spirits, what causes paranormal activities? - Quora

response.answer_text: Oh dear. The dogmatic answers here to the effect that “paranormal activities” are non-existent have missed the enormous body of research which has been carried out by parapsychologists over many years and is still being carried on right now. Whether “ghosts” or “spirits” have an independent existence is an open question, but it cannot be denied that there have been many verified sightings of apparitions and some very impressive demonstrations of mediumship. Forget what you see in TV ghost hunting programmes. The Society for Psychical Research has an authoritative online encyclopaedia. Here are a few articles to start with: Ghosts and Apparitions in Psi Research (Overview) Mental Mediumship Research Experimental Parapsychology

If there are no ghosts or spirits, what causes paranormal activities? Not only are there no ghosts or spirits, there are also no paranormal activities. > Ghosts are imaginary and do not exist.> Spirits are imaginary and also do not exist.> Paranormal activities are also imaginary and do not exist either. All reports of the supernatural are fraud or delusion.There are no exceptions. There. Now you can go ahead and enjoy your life.
